title: Trump faces MAGA backlash over Qatari 'palace in the sky' gift
shortDescription: Criticism of President Trump's plan to accept a "palace in the sky" Boeing 47-8 plane from the Qatar royal family isn't just coming from Democrats.

title: Trump says only a Putin sit-down can save Ukraine peace talks
shortDescription: "Nothing's going to happen until Putin and I get together," Trump told reporters aboard Air Force One.

title: SCOTUS hears case on judges' block of Trump EO
shortDescription: The justices heard arguments on whether its ok for judges to universally block President Donald Trump's birthright citizenship executive order.

title: Trump chides Apple CEO over iPhone factories in India
shortDescription: "India can take care of themselves, they are doing very well, we want you to build here,'" Trump says he told the businessman.

title: Trump plays 'YMCA' to close US-Saudi Arabia forum
shortDescription: Donald Trump ended his speech in Saudi Arabia with "YMCA," a song associated with the LGBTQ+ community, in a country where homosexuality is illegal.

title: What is birthright citizenship? Explaining Trump's desired changes
shortDescription: The U.S. Supreme Court will hear arguments May 15 over Trump's bid to end birthright citizenship. Here's what that is, and what Trump wants to do.

title: Trump says he's close to making nuclear deal with Iran
shortDescription: "We're in very serious negotiations with Iran for long-term peace," President Donald Trump said on a tour of the Persian Gulf region.

title: Trump makes 'historic' deal with Boeing
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's trip to Qatar was overshadowed by his plan to accept a $400 million 747 jet as a gift from the country.

title: Tanks, cannons, soldiers sleeping in DC offices: Trump's parade plans
shortDescription: For Trump's historic military parade, soldiers' chow will consist of two Meals Ready to Eat and one hot meal a day. Bring your sleeping bags, said one official.

title: How Trump's war on 'woke' DEI is spreading to states
shortDescription: A wave of new legislation targeting diversity, equity and inclusion is rolling through Republican-controlled statehouses. Here's why.

title: Ben Cohen kicked out of Senate hearing
shortDescription: Capitol Police was directed to physically remove protesters from a Senate hearing, including Ben Cohen of Ben & Jerry's.

title: How Air Force One stacks up to Trump's coveted 'palace in the sky'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says Air Force One isn't as impressive as some of the planes of the leaders of Qatar, Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates.

title: House GOP advances bill to spend $5 billion on private school vouchers
shortDescription: House Republicans backed President Trump's private school-voucher agenda when the House Ways and Means Committee approved a budget proposal on May 14

title: Supreme Court takes up birthright citizenship: major Trump case explained
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is considering whether Trump's executive order ending birthright citizenship can be enforced while it's challenged in court.
